content: w+tk short row 5 p4 w+tp short row 6 k5 w+tk short row 7 p6 w+tp short row 8 k7 w+tk short row 9 purl 17 sts to end of row row 2 increase kfb knit to last st kfb - 20sts row 3 purl row 4 increase kfb knit to last st kfb - 22sts row 5 purl pm on first and last stitch of last row for left and right wing markers row 6 decrease k2tog knit to last 2 sts k2tog - 20sts row 7 purl row 8-19 decrease repeat last 2 row six times - 8sts row 20 decrease k2tog knit to last 2 sts k2tog - 6sts fig 5 cast off all 6 back wing sts purl-wise pm in the centre of the cast-off edge for lower wing end marker wol page 14 wol page 15 wing lower edges row 1 purl the wing lower edges are picked up and knitted along the wings that you ve you ll now join on yarn dd use the other end of the ball to add the darker wing just finished knitted into row ends from marker to cast-off edge as follows markings the yarn that s not in use is stranded across the back until needed as fol- lows left wing lower edge with the left wing facing you and the left wing marker to your right with yarn row 2 increase with yarn ac k3 with yarn dd k2 ac k2 dd k2 ac k2 dd k2 ac ac starting at the left wing marker pick up and knit 13 sts into row ends towards k1 kfb - 16sts the back wing cast-off edge pick up and knit 2 sts along the cast-off edge to the row 3 decrease with yarn ac p3 with yarn dd p2 ac p2 dd p2 ac p2 dd p2 centre at the lower wing end marker - 15sts - ref fig 7 pick up and knit from a ac p1 p2tog - 15sts to b b to c fig 8 shows the left wing lower edge as knitted row 4 increase with yarn ac k2 with yarn dd k2 ac k2 dd k2 ac k2 dd k2 ac k2 dd kfb - 16sts row 5 decrease with yarn dd p2 with yarn ac p2 dd p2 ac p2 dd p2 ac p2 d c dd p2 ac p2tog - 15sts row 6 increase with yarn ac k1 with yarn dd k2 ac k2 dd k2 ac k2 dd k2 ac k2 dd k1 kfb - 16sts c b row 7 decrease with yarn dd p3 with yarn ac p2 dd p2 ac p2 dd p2 ac p2 e dd p1 p2tog - 15sts pm on last st for left wing to leg top marker row 8 increase with yarn dd k2 ac k2 dd k2 ac k2 dd k2 ac k3 dd k1 kfb - 16sts a alternating with yarn dd and ac cast off all 16 left wing sts
